settings.text:
Aeromark can create & develop your signature scent that will bring your brand, product, or space to life.

We can customize your unique scent with an added benefit of anti-bacterial & anti-viral, or anti-smoke actives.

Our diffuser machines have many automated functions, allowing for a low maintenance operations & removing any need for a learning curve to scent your space. The formulation of your scent is based on the machine to be used.

Your fragrance satisfaction is our priority.

Our diffuser machines have many automated functions, allowing for a low maintenance operations & removing any need for a learning curve to scent your space. The formulation of your scent is based on the machine to be used.

Your fragrance satisfaction is our priority.

settings.heading: WHAT IS BEHIND THE SUCCESS OF AEROMARK?

settings.text:
Aeromark's strong performance in the air-scenting business is born out of the over 38 years of experience and worldwide fragrance resources of its parent company, Chemworld Marketing Corp.

Chemworld initially focused on distribution of specialty chemicals in the personal care and food industries when it started in 1985.

With its reputation as a reliable and trusted source of specialty ingredients, Chemworld added fragrances and flavours from the top fragrance houses in the world, to its product line.

Chemworld is an active member of Chamber of Cosmetics Industry of the Philippines Inc. and Philippine Society for Cosmetic Science Inc.
